code: import axios from"axios";var API_URL="http://localhost:5000";export var ApiGet=function ApiGet(url,par){return axios({method:"get",url:API_URL+url,params:par}).then(function(response){return response.data;}).catch(function(error){throw error;});};export var ApiPost=function ApiPost(url,body){return axios({method:"post",url:API_URL+url,data:body}).then(function(response){return response.data;}).catch(function(error){throw error;});};export var ApiPut=function ApiPut(url){var body=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:{};return axios({method:"put",url:API_URL+url,data:body}).then(function(response){return response.data;}).catch(function(error){throw error;});};export var ApiDelete=function ApiDelete(url){return axios({method:"delete",url:API_URL+url}).then(function(response){return response.data;}).catch(function(error){throw error;});};
